mil3.1.6:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.1.6:1.2_0: “There is nothing wrong with the dragon.”
mil3.1.6:1.3_0: A senior monk who brought the following:
mil3.1.6:1.6_0: “Great king, that stone is lost, sir.”
mil3.1.6:1.7_0: “But sir, can you act with Nāgadatta?”
mil3.1.6:1.8_0: “If I were to grasp that grasping, great king, I’ll look to enjoy grasping, because of grasping, I’ll be not grasping.”
